## **Intro**

My name is Melike Aksoy. I am 2nd year Master of Public Health student in Columbia Mailman School of Public Health. My department is Biostatistics and my certificate is Advanced Epidemiology.

I like reading, photography, traveling, hiking, coloring, listening to music. I have four cats!
